name: NPCs
description: Play as familiar characters as you take on a dystopian world occupied by NPCs masquerading as real living humans in a 3D First Person Shooter.  You have been dropped into NPC Square, a walled off quarantine zone.  This is a humorous, satirical game where you fight endless hordes of "NPCs" hell bent on destroying the eccentric and unique playable characters.  You observe the programming of unaware NPCs by the NPC New Organization and attempt to destroy as many bots as you can to help free the world.  Said saviors of the world include: Feel Guy, Chad, Virgin, a 30 yr old Boomer, a Brainlet, and a Zoomer.
